title: Edulabad’s Ancient Petroglyphs Face Neglect Amid Urban Threat
description: Local historian Dr G. Dasarath noted that the Sri Goda Ranganatha Swamy Temple was Edulabad's key ancient landmark from the 15th-16th century Quli Qutb Shah era.

title: Monstrous shark ruled ancient Australian seas before megalodon, researchers say
description: The ancestor of today’s great white shark was thought to be about eight metres long, the authors of a paper published in Communications Biology said.

title: How Lebanon’s ancient olive trees became casualties of Israel-Hezbollah war
description: article author: NAJIA HOUSSARISat, 2025-12-13 20:12BEIRUT: Farmers in southern Lebanon have long held a fierce pride in their ancient olive groves. Many boast that their trees, which stretch along the border with Israel, contain specimens “dating back to the time of the pharaohs.”However, since the most recent war between Israel and Hezbollah, which ran from October 2023 to November 2024, these trees — the stoic, living witnesses of history — have become casualties of the destruction.Main category: Middle-East Analysis

title: Reward Offered After Stolen Ancient Skull Shows Up in Facebook Selfie
description: The case came to light after a photograph showing a man holding the skull appeared on Facebook earlier this year.

title: This Ancient Router Type Is Considered Outdated - Do You Still Use It?
description: WiFi routers are an essential part of any home networking setup, but artefacts from earlier times can clog your bandwidth and limit speeds.
